channel.title: [Standard] NUF FM 2 - GAME OVER (MAFIA + NEUTRAL VICTORY)
channel.description:
![](https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/2128140.jpg)
○ Lan WangJi: "Is it amusing, trifling with empty words?" ○ Wei WuXian: "It’s very amusing. But, believe me, my words are as much a trifle as my moves are, which means not at all." ○ "..." Lan WangJi muttered to himself. "Why am I sitting here having such a useless conversation with you?" --- -- Mo Dao Zu Shi --- --- #### Hosted by @Zone_Q11, reviewed by @Geyde --- # Rules:
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules and the [Forum Mafia Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). 1. Post a minimum of 20 game related posts per Day Phase. 1. Do not forget to leave a vote at the end of the day. (Unless Majority was activated.) 1. Fail to heed the former three rules more than thrice, and you will be subbed out or modkilled. 1. With the exception of the first rule, I can add and/or remove rules in the future.
# General Gameplay * Days are 48 hours unless majority is reached early and nights are 24 hours. * There are no logs / last will mechanics. * Self-votes are considered valid votes. * Votes are locked in MyLo and LyLo scenarios. * All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote**. This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. (Please don't put your votes at the end of a sentence and make a new line instead.) * All actions must be submitted in your classcards. * Flips will be shown after a player dies. * The Mafia factional kill IS mandatory. * The Mafia factional kill IS assigned. That is, a specific member of the Mafia must be chosen to perform the factional kill. If no member is selected, the last member who submitted a kill will be assumed to perform it. * The Mafia will communicate through a private message. * The game starts when the player list is fully filled.
# Gameplay * This is a standard closed setup. * Executions are majority and plurality. In cases of a tie, the executions will be determined randomly among the players [u]outside the tie[/u]. * No Exe is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In case No Exe and a player are tied at the end of the day, No Exe takes priority.
# Player List:
1. EliThePsycho - **[color=]Endgamed, GonZ555 (Town Ninja Sleepwalker)[/color]** 1. Intensify - **[color=]Endgamed, melomarl (Town Vanilla)[/color]** 1. EVO - **[color=red]Survived, Ophious (Mafia Mind Controller)[/color]** 1. Tilgarial - **[color=red]Survived, Kalto (Mafia "Vanilla Lawyer")[/color]** 1. ~~Marluxion - **[color=]Executed D1, Nahrenne (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~min - **[color=]Killed N1, AliceShiki (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~Aelin - **[color=red]Executed D2, akki (Mafia 1-Shot Magistrate)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~clonedcheese - **[color=]Killed N2, Osamaru (Town 2-Shot Doctor)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~cdecora - **[color=gray]Left Victoriously D3, Togepi (Neutral "Vanilla" 1-Shot BPV "Gated Communist")[/color]**~~ 1. ~~GonZ - **[color=]Killed N3, Novela (Town Peeping Tom)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~eevee - **[color=]Executed D4, Westeller (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~lol - **[color=]Killed N4, Ai chan (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~**PokemonKidRyan - **[color=]Executed D5, Gandire Alea (Town Vanilla Cop)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~WindwardAway - **[color=]Killed N5, Fossil (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~ 1. ~~**an_gorta_pratai - **[color=]Executed D6, OnceandFutureLurker (Town Vanilla)[/color]**~~
### **Backups:** 1. Whysper 1. Blitz 1. glass 1. Nightingale
### **Spectators:**
1. Jane 1. Arete 1. thepigeonnyc 1. katze 1. Wazza 1. DatBird 1. TrustworthyLiberal 1. Conduit 1. KyoDaz 1. astand 1. GGhana 1. AtNoName
### **Thread summary:** - [D1 End - Marluxion executed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/2176) - [D2 Start - min killed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/2179) - [D2 End - Aelin executed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/3121) - [D3 Start - clonedcheese killed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/3122) - [D3 End - cdecora left victoriously](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/4516) - [D4 Start - GonZ killed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/4517) - [D4 End - eevee executed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/5043) - [D5 Start - lol killed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/5046) - [D5 End - PokemonKidRyan executed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/5620) - [D6 Start - WindwardAway killed](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/5623) - [Game Over - Mafia Victory](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/87229/5799)

item.description:
I mean … it isn’t as though I was involved for the last month for personal reasons on this web site.
There will be champs on Mafia Universe soon and I put my hand up to test possible setups for champs.
But hey, I don’t expect glory for doing the grunt work.
